DOC.brief_summary: This research protocol compare Theramine non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug ( NSAID ) treatment chronic back pain . The study examine efficacy tolerability Theramine alone patient chronic back pain comparison NSAID , Ibuprofen , co-administration Ibuprofen Theramine .
DOC.brief_title: A Double Blind Placebo Study Determine Effectiveness Theramine Management Chronic Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: The diagnosis management back pain challenge primary care physicians specialist . Establishing etiology difficult often problematic , treatment option capable produce serious potentially life threatening side effect . Treatments often exert modest impact natural history condition . Non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) frequently prescribe treat chronic back pain . NSAIDs moderately effective relieve pain . NSAIDs lead cause drug-induced gastrointestinal bleeds , common cause drug-induced morbidity mortality particularly high dose . They also exacerbate hypertension , edema produce nephrotoxicity . The effect also dose dependent . Recent data indicate NSAIDs risk factor myocardial infarction , particularly high dos . Recent data also indicate NSAIDs disrupt collagen repair injured tissue . Muscle relaxant narcotic analgesic show limited efficacy often produce sedation , constipation inappropriate usage . Physical therapy local modality often satisfy , costly , require considerable investment patient time . Neurotransmitter depletion demonstrate contribute chronic pain state . Increased nutrient requirement associate pain syndrome consequent reduce production neurotransmitter contribute maladaptive pain response . The ability enhance neurotransmitter production associate pain syndrome limited multiple factor , specifically unavailability adequate essential amino acid diet increase turnover rate amino acid need produce neurotransmitter pain syndrome . Other factor prolong pharmaceutical use deplete nerve cell neurotransmitter . Attempts modify brain neurochemistry focus single neurotransmitter serotonin GABA . However , approach fail address complexity complementary influence multiple neurotransmitter patient perception pain suffering . Theramine proprietary prescription Medical Food concurrently enhance several neurotransmitter involve pain modulation sensation provide neurotransmitter precursor form amino acid , ( see attach Monograph detailed discussion ) . Small trial find Theramine effective reduce modify pain without demonstrable side effect . Theramine simultaneously stimulate production neurotransmitter serotonin , GABA , brain induced cortisol , nitric oxide , glutamate .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Back pain lasting great six ( 6 ) week . Pain must present least 5 7 day two week prior screen visit 2 . Analgesic medication use treat pain least 4 last 7 day least 10 day last month 3 . Men nonpregnant , nonlactating woman age 18 age 75 , able read , understand sign Englishlanguage inform consent , diagnosis back pain baseline back pain great 40 mm 100 mm visual analog scale 4 . Those take NSAID pain must discontinue use washout period base attached five ( 5 ) halflives drug chart 5 . If undergoing physical therapy back pain , therapy must stable least three ( 3 ) week prior study remain throughout study 6 . If use psychoactive medication might analgesic effect , ( i.e . antidepressant anticonvulsant ) , treatment must stable least three ( 3 ) month prior study 7 . For men woman childbearing potential , must willing use adequate contraception pregnant impregnate partner entire time study 8 . Must willing commit clinical visit studyrelated procedure , include require discontinuation ( washout ) analgesic antiinflammatory medication prior Day 1 randomization . The patient must agree use acetaminophen rescue medication 1 . Patients back surgery past six ( 6 ) month 2 . Patients significant neurologic impairment , diagnose screen physical examination 3 . Patients evidence history fracture spine past year 4 . Patients fluent English 5 . Use aspirin nonarthritic condition , unless dose less equal 325 mg day , must stable least one ( 1 ) month prior screen 6 . Use controlled substance and/or opiate analgesic pain , 5 day within last 30 day prior screen visit 7 . Receipt oral intramuscular softtissue injection corticosteroid within one ( 1 ) month prior screen 8 . Participation clinical trial within one ( 1 ) month prior screen 9 . History epidural past three ( 3 ) month 10 . History alcohol substance abuse 11 . Uncontrolled unstable serious cardiovascular , pulmonary , gastrointestinal urogenital , endocrine , neurologic psychiatric disorder 12 .
